name: P4
description:
A find n' charge game where you must lead a robot to the goal before it's charge runs out. Find the charging stations, recharge, and get to the goal before your energy runs out!

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

** Not much of a game right now as there's only one level and no randomization. I'll be updating over the next few days, and add some screenshots.

Up for testing though.
